languages.text: "Доводы? Надо быть слепцом, чтобы не увидеть все признаки культистской активности! Вы хотя бы раз имели дело с подобной угрозой, губернатор Медина? Я — имел{mf||а}, когда был{mf||а} в рядах Астра Милитарум, так что не тратьте мое время на доказывание вам очевидных вещей и сделайте милость довериться моему опыту!"

"My reasoning? One would have to be blind not to see all the signs of cultist activity! Have you ever had to deal with such a threat before, Governor Medineh? As a soldier of the Astra Militarum, I have, so do not waste my time with requests to prove the obvious, because I speak from experience!"
languages.original_text: "Доводы? Надо быть слепцом, чтобы не увидеть все признаки культистской активности! Вы хотя бы раз имели дело с подобной угрозой, губернатор Медина? Я — имел{mf||а}, когда был{mf||а} в рядах Астра Милитарум, так что не тратьте мое время на доказывание вам очевидных вещей и сделайте милость довериться моему опыту!"

traits.locale_text: "Reasons? One would have to be blind not to see all the signs of cultist activity! Have you ever had to deal with such a threat before, Governor Medineh? I have, so do not waste my time with requests to prove you the obvious, because I speak from experience"

"Reasons? One would have to be blind not to see all the signs of cultist activity! Have you ever had to deal with such a threat before, Governor Medineh? I have, so do not waste my time with requests to prove the obvious, because I speak from experience"

"Reasons? One would have to be blind not to see all the signs of cultist activity! Have you ever had to deal with such a threat before, Governor Medineh? I have, so do not waste my time with requests to prove the obvious, because I speak from experience"

"My reasoning? One would have to be blind not to see all the signs of cultist activity! Have you ever had to deal with such a threat before, Governor Medineh? I have, so do not waste my time with requests to prove the obvious, because I speak from experience"

"My reasoning? One would have to be blind not to see all the signs of cultist activity! Have you ever had to deal with such a threat before, Governor Medineh? I have, so do not waste my time with requests to prove the obvious, because I speak from experience"

"My reasoning? One would have to be blind not to see all the signs of cultist activity! Have you ever had to deal with such a threat before, Governor Medineh? As a soldier of the Astra Militarum, I have, so do not waste my time with requests to prove the obvious, because I speak from experience!"

languages.text: "Meine Schlussfolgerung? Man müsste blind sein, um die vielen Anzeichen kultischer Aktivität nicht zu sehen! Hattet Ihr schon jemals mit so einer Bedrohung zu tun, Gouverneur Medineh? Ich schon, als {mf|Soldat|Soldatin} des Astra Militarum, also vergeudet nicht meine Zeit mit Bitten, das Offensichtliche zu beweisen, denn ich spreche aus Erfahrung."
languages.original_text: "My reasoning? One would have to be blind not to see all the signs of cultist activity! Have you ever had to deal with such a threat before, Governor Medineh? As a soldier of the Astra Militarum, I have, so do not waste my time with requests to prove the obvious, because I speak from experience!"

traits.locale_text: "Gründe? Man müsste blind sein, um die vielen Anzeichen kultischer Aktivität nicht zu sehen! Hattet Ihr schon jemals mit so einer Bedrohung zu tun, Gouverneur Medineh? Ich schon, also vergeudet nicht meine Zeit mit Bitten, das Offensichtliche zu beweisen, denn ich spreche aus Erfahrung."

languages.text: « Mon raisonnement ? Il faudrait être aveugle pour ne pas remarquer les signes d'activité des cultistes ! Avez-vous déjà rencontré ce genre de menace, gouverneur Medineh ? En tant que soldat de l'Astra Militarum, j'en ai eu l'occasion, alors ne me faites pas perdre plus de temps en me demandant de vous prouver une évidence, parce que je sais de quoi je parle ! »
languages.original_text: "My reasoning? One would have to be blind not to see all the signs of cultist activity! Have you ever had to deal with such a threat before, Governor Medineh? As a soldier of the Astra Militarum, I have, so do not waste my time with requests to prove the obvious, because I speak from experience!"

traits.locale_text: « Mon raisonnement ? Il faudrait être aveugle pour ne pas remarquer les signes d'activité des cultistes ! Avez-vous déjà rencontré ce genre de menace, gouverneur Medineh ? En tant que soldat de l'Astra Militarum, j'en ai eu l'occasion, alors ne me faites pas perdre plus de temps en me demandant de vous prouver une évidence, parce que je sais de quoi je parle ! »

languages.text: “原因？恐怕只有瞎子，才会对邪教活动的迹象视而不见！你以前遇到过这样的威胁吗，梅迪涅总督？我告诉你，我在星界军任职的那段时间遇到过，所以别再逼我把宝贵的时间浪费在这些显而易见的事情上了，因为我说的话都是经验之谈。”
languages.original_text: "My reasoning? One would have to be blind not to see all the signs of cultist activity! Have you ever had to deal with such a threat before, Governor Medineh? As a soldier of the Astra Militarum, I have, so do not waste my time with requests to prove the obvious, because I speak from experience!"

traits.locale_text: “原因？恐怕只有瞎子，才看不到邪教活动的迹象！你以前遇到过这样的威胁吗，梅迪涅总督？我告诉你，我遇到过，所以别再逼我把宝贵的时间浪费在这些显而易见的事情上了，因为我说的话都是经验之谈。”

languages.text: 「理由？魔女団が活動しているのは一目瞭然だ！メディネ総督、お前は、これまでそのような脅威に対処したことはあるか？帝国防衛軍の兵士として、私はある。だから、自明なことを証明させようとして時間を無駄にするのはやめろ。私は経験から物を言っているんだからな」
languages.original_text: "My reasoning? One would have to be blind not to see all the signs of cultist activity! Have you ever had to deal with such a threat before, Governor Medineh? As a soldier of the Astra Militarum, I have, so do not waste my time with requests to prove the obvious, because I speak from experience!"

traits.locale_text: 「理由？魔女団が活動しているのは一目瞭然だ！メディネ総督、お前はこれまでそのような脅威に対処したことはあるか？私はある。だから、自明なことを証明させようとして時間を無駄にするのはやめろ。私は経験から物を言っているんだからな」

languages.text: «¿Mis razones? ¡Nadie pasaría por alto tal nivel de actividad cultista! ¿Alguna vez ha tenido que enfrentarse a una amenaza de tal calibre, gobernador Medineh? Porque en mi servicio al Astra Militarum yo sí, así que no me haga perder el tiempo demostrando algo obvio, porque hablo desde la experiencia».
languages.original_text: "My reasoning? One would have to be blind not to see all the signs of cultist activity! Have you ever had to deal with such a threat before, Governor Medineh? As a soldier of the Astra Militarum, I have, so do not waste my time with requests to prove the obvious, because I speak from experience!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Mis razones? ¡Nadie pasaría por alto tal nivel de actividad cultista! ¿Alguna vez ha tenido que enfrentarse a una amenaza de tal calibre, gobernador Medineh? Porque en mi servicio al Astra Militarum yo sí, así que no me haga perder el tiempo demostrando algo obvio, porque hablo desde la experiencia».

languages.text: "Nasıl mı vardım? Buradaki tarikatçı faaliyetlerinin işaretlerini görememek için kör olmak gerekir! Daha önce böyle bir tehditle başa çıktınız mı Vali Medineh? Bir Astra Militarum askeri olarak ben çıktım, o yüzden aşikâr olanı kanıtlamamı isteyerek vaktimi çalmayın. Zira tecrübeme istinaden konuşuyorum!"
languages.original_text: "My reasoning? One would have to be blind not to see all the signs of cultist activity! Have you ever had to deal with such a threat before, Governor Medineh? As a soldier of the Astra Militarum, I have, so do not waste my time with requests to prove the obvious, because I speak from experience!"

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl mı vardım? Buradaki tarikatçı faaliyetlerinin işaretlerini görememek için kör olmak gerekir! Daha önce böyle bir tehditle başa çıktınız mı Vali Medineh? Bir Astra Militarum askeri olarak ben çıktım, o yüzden aşikâr olanı kanıtlamamı isteyerek vaktimi çalmayın. Zira tecrübeme istinaden konuşuyorum!"
